programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull represents a woman who is guilty of kidnapping her niece years ago to stop the girl's father from abusing her.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: An expert on anthrax is accused of orchestrating a series of anthrax attacks; Bull sets out to prove the city was in such a rush to calm the public's hysteria, they arrested the wrong person.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull defends a train engineer who has no memory of a fatal crash he allegedly caused, due to a brain injury he sustained in the collision.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull mounts the defense of an idealistic state judge who's on trial for obstruction of justice after she helped a trial witness evade federal arrest in her courtroom.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull and the team help Taylor bring a civil suit against the woman who killed Taylor's friend in a hit-and-run when the driver evades criminal charges by claiming diplomatic immunity.

programme.desc: After Toby hooks up with a woman at a nightclub, she is found dead and he is a suspect in her murder.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When Toby saves a troubled teen from a gang beating, he stumbles upon a hidden group of runaways.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby tries to help the sister of a shooting victim find out who killed her brother.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When Toby sees a woman revive a badly injured baby, he becomes curious about her gift.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby uses his gift to help Detective Marks gather intelligence from the traumatized victim of a serial rapist.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When the only witness to a double murder is unable to speak, Toby reads his mind to determine what happened.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Olivia learn that Oz's parents' restaurant is in trouble; Toby uses his telepathy to try to solve a missing persons case.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When a patient dies after a hit-and-run accident, Toby discovers that the man was convicted of embezzling millions of dollars.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby helps a woman regain her memory and draws the attention of the Integrated Investigative Bureau.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: McCluskey recruits Toby on a case involving smuggled weapons.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After an earthquake in Hawaii, Mac and the team join Chin and Kono from the Five-0 task force to rescue a group of government scientists trapped in a building; another group tries to steal top-secret weaponry from the scientists.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac's close friend from M.I.T. fakes her own death to prevent someone from killing her to suppress her scientific research.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When the team intercepts a terror group's message for Murdoc, instructing him to kill a tech analyst, Mac poses as a psychopath to save the intended victim.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Murdoc moves ahead with his plans for revenge against MacGyver by recruiting his recently released former cellmate to infiltrate the Phoenix Complex and kill every agent inside.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver uses a cell phone and soccer ball in the search for a Navy SEAL who is believed to be held captive in the Middle East.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Riley disappears during her first solo mission; Mac and the team attempt to locate her.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and the team must steal diamonds before terrorists beat them to it and trade the jewels for a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Murdoc drugs and kidnaps MacGyver, Mac must escape and join the team to save Murdoc's next victim.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: The team's Halloween plans are interrupted when the vice president's son's plane goes down with a mysterious prisoner on board.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and the team attempt to extinguish a massive oil wellhead fire set by a rebel group in Nigeria.
